attributes.value: Respects the law

Values tradition
Places cooperation as one of the highest ideals

Is completely wrapped up in her own appearance, abilities and other personal matters

Is not a private person and freely shares details of her life
Is frustratingly sloppy and careless with every task she sets to carry out
